nodes.text: The Coruscant Security Force Senior Command or CSF Senior Command were the senior officers in charge of the Coruscant Security Force during the waning days of the Galactic Republic. They were located at the CSF Headquarters in Galactic City on the planet Coruscant.

During the Clone Wars, in 21 BBY, Senior Command was hesitant about Grand Army of the Republic commandos conducting anti-terror operations on Coruscant. However, the mission was a success and the CSF Anti-Terrorism Unit was given the majority of the credit for dismantling of the terrorist cells. The Senior Command was replaced by the Sector Command after the formation of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY.
The Coruscant Security Force Senior Command first appeared in Republic Commando: Triple Zero by Karen Traviss, published on February 28, 2006.
